meanings.definition: Users with elevated privileges on a computer system.
meanings.sent1: The superusers can access special areas of the computer.
meanings.sent2: The IT department has designated superusers to manage the network.
meanings.sent3: The superusers threw a party in the server room, and everyone had a blast!
meanings.sent4: She was like a superuser, effortlessly navigating through the system.
meanings.sent5: The superusers are like the wizards of the digital realm, wielding great power.

meanings.definition: People who have extensive knowledge and expertise in a particular subject or field.
meanings.sent1: The superusers shared their expertise with the team.
meanings.sent2: In the tech world, superusers are highly respected for their skills.
meanings.sent3: The superusers organized a trivia night to showcase their knowledge.
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like a superuser, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The superusers are the go-to experts for any tech-related questions.
